subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: On the eve of baseball’s winter meetings in Dallas, the Miami Marlins and Reyes agreed to a six-year contract worth $106 million, according to a person with direct knowledge of the agreement.
snippet: On the eve of baseball’s winter meetings in Dallas, the Miami Marlins and Reyes agreed to a six-year contract worth $106 million, according to a person with direct knowledge of the agreement.
